abstracts.cdata!:
The main objectives of the proposed
            project would be to assess the economic justification and
            technical viability of the Karnali (Chisapani) Multipurpose
            Project on the Karnali River in Nepal. The studies under
            Phase I would be carried out over about two and a half years
            and would include the following components: (a) preparation
            of the feasibility study for the Karnali (Chisapani)
            Multipurpose Project; (b) prefeasibility of a smaller
            hydroelectric project upstream of Chisapani; and (c)
            provision of consulting services to HMG in the form of
            general advice on all aspects related to the studies being
            undertaken by the main consultants.
